event.title: Chemnitz Linux Days in Chemnitz, Germany

body.p: The Chemnitzer Linux Days is one of the largest Free Software conferences in Germany. It is a long-standing event for education about Linux and Free Software. The event includes workshops, lectures and beginners' talks in the central building of the Chemnitz University of Technology.

The FSFE will be present with an information booth. On Saturday at 09:30, the FSFE's Policy Project Manager Johannes NÃ¤der will present Youth Hacking 4 Freedom, the Free Software competition for young people aged 14-18, currently in its 3rd year.
